page.title: 06HOME FARM LT.WALTHAM II
page.content: As there are only three men working the farm they need a lot of machinery. they have got four tractors.Outside the tractor is very noisy but once inside it is much quieter.The farmers have a radio inside the tractor to keep them company while they are working, there are also a lot of controls including ten gears, they need these to gain more power from the engine, the rest of the controls are very similar to cars but larger.On the front of the tractor you can add weights to balance it up.The two large tyres at the back of the tractor cost over six hundred pounds each.The tractors now a days are much more comfortable than what they were.Also on the farm they have got a Combine Harvester,this is used for cutting, threshing and baling.
